function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependent variables like cognitive performance impacting scientific evidence","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data leading to ineffective decision-making","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive and detailed studies to account for all possible variables affecting cognitive performance","Technologies":"Data analytics tools for comprehensive data analysis","People":"Researchers, scientists, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of standardized POE protocol for occupant surveys","Impact":"Inconsistent data collection and analysis, leading to unreliable results","Mitigation":"Development of a universally standardized POE protocol for occupant surveys","Technologies":"Survey management software for standardized data collection","People":"Occupants, building owners, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, accreditation bodies"},{"Description":"Aggressive pursuit of certification from IEQ accreditation schemes leading to performance-focused decisions","Impact":"Overemphasis on certification may neglect holistic approach to IEQ improvement","Mitigation":"Promotion of holistic IEQ improvement alongside certification pursuit","Technologies":"Integrated building management systems for comprehensive IEQ monitoring","People":"Building owners, operators, certified assessors","Owner":"Certification bodies, industry organizations"}]}
